Designs by Gjovaag - Don Jovag

I turn and sell segmented bowls, platters and bangles. I am also the author of two books on segmented turning. The first, Segmented Bowls For The Beginning Turner, is designed for the beginning or experienced turner that wishes to take up the challenge of turning a segmented bowl. The second is Turning Segmented Wooden Bangles On The Wood Lathe. It includes the design, assembly and turning of segmented bangles. Both are published by Schiffer Publishing.
